title: Refuge of Dragons
description: The long-awaited sequel to Carrie Vaughn's novel VOICES OF DRAGONS is finally here. Kay and Artegal arrive at the fabled Dracopolis, the refuge where dragons and people have lived in peace for centuries. And now, without knowing if their virgin sacrifice stunt worked to avert war, they learn that they are not allowed to leave.Meanwhile, back in Silver River, Kay's boyfriend Jon has decided to go after them...
author: Carrie Vaughn
